Howard Willis Easterling (November 26, 1911 – September 6, 1993) was an American third baseman in Negro league baseball who played between 1937 and 1954.
A native of Mount Olive, Mississippi, Easterling served in the US Army during World War II. He died in Collins, Mississippi in 1993 at age 81.
